op.title: IT'S ACTUALLY OVER!!
op.body:
WAKE UP!!!

NEW YORK, PENNSYLVANIA, BALTIMORE, WASHINGTON DC, BOSTON JUST GOT WIPED THE FUCK OUT!!!

THE COMMIE BASTARDS REALLY DID IT!!!! EVERYBODY RUN FOR YOUR LIVES

replies.body:
Why do all you /NEWbies fall for such blatant hoa-
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!
Any California boys up? What's going on? Is this shit real?

>What's going on?

Look out your window in 2 minutes, 12 seconds

REPENT FOR YOUR SINS. ONLY THE MIGHTY LORD GOD AND HIS SON JESUS CHRIST CAN SAVE YOUR SOULS.

REVELATION 20-21: And the rest of the men which were not killed by these plagues yet repented not of the works of their hands, that they should not worship devils, and idols of gold, and silver, and brass, and stone, and of wood: which neither can see, nor hear, nor walk:
Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
